0000101011100011 0000011111000011 0 -> sum: 0001001010100110, cout: 0
1111000101000001 0010000001010101 0 -> sum: 0001000110010110, cout: 1

1011011001011000 1011111011110111 0 -> sum: 0111010101001111, cout: 1
0000011010101001 1000001000100101 1 -> sum: 1000100011001111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
